Chapter Previous Next

class gstEffect

Base class for PHANToM special effects. Unlike other GHOST force phenomena, these effects are geometry-independent, meaning that forces are not generated based on any specific geometric object.

From header file: gstEffect.h

Constructors and Destructors
~gstEffectDestructor.
gstEffectThis class is intended as a base class only, the constructor is protected so that instances can not be created.
Functions
isActive Returns TRUE if manip is currently active.
Virtual Functions
calcEffectForce
calcEffectForceThis method will protect current customer's code by allowing it to compile and run in the new scheme where the method is called with two arguments.

stopFor extension:
Data Members
protected
gstBoolean active;For extension: TRUE if effect is active.
